We regard Turkey's success as our own success.
We are delighted with all the successes and are glad that Turkish-Azerbaijani relations today are experiencing dynamic development.
We cooperate in all areas as brothers and sisters. We are allies in the political sphere.
Today, there are no other countries in the world that can be closer to each other than Turkey-Azerbaijan.
Mutual investment is successfully solved and investments of Azerbaijan are invested in Turkey and Turkish investments are invested in Azerbaijan.
We are grateful to the Turkish government that we are constantly paying attention to us, supporting us in the just cause of Azerbaijan, supporting us.
I am very pleased to be in the territory of Sister Iran. I am convinced that my visit will be an important step for the development of Iranian-Azerbaijani relations.
This trip is my third official visit to Iran. The number of visits is an indicator of itself.
We want our relationships to develop successfully in all areas, and now there are many excellent opportunities to achieve that.
The position of the Islamic Republic of Iran on Karabakh is based on justice, international law and we are grateful for that position.
Our history, our culture, our historical heritage are very valuable to our peoples. Our peoples have lived and created for centuries.
Our peoples are deeply rooted in historical and cultural roots. Iranian-Azerbaijani relations are based on this solid foundation today.
We will reach all the goals that we have set and will raise the Iranian-Azerbaijani relations to a higher level with joint efforts.
